liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

costs.label: Cost to eat
costs.tooltip: Set the default cost for this command.

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on cooldown for $cd minutes!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd minutes!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

responseInvalidInput.value: $user please enter a positive number with no decimal places
responseInvalidInput.label: Entering a valid number
responseInvalidInput.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the user enters an invalid number. 
 $user = username

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: $user, you do not have enough $currency , sit back, relax and watch the stream to get some $currency <3
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $user = username 
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseSpecifyMorePoints.value: $user are you not hungry? Try eating more $currency :)
responseSpecifyMorePoints.label: Message when a user wants to eat 0
responseSpecifyMorePoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user inputs 0.
 $user = Username
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseMultipleSuccessful.label: Eat multiple (!nom $number)
responseMultipleSuccessful.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user eats multiple cookies.
 $user = username

responseSingularSuccessful.label: Eat one message (!nom)
responseSingularSuccessful.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user eats multiple cookies.
 $user = username
